title: 6.20 not patching
body: I've tried everything, uninstalling re-installing, hextech repair tool, in-client repair tool, deleting the projects folder, running as admin. Nothing has worked. The best I've gotten was to 76% and then getting the update failed. Sometimes it'll only get to 33%. I JUST WANNA PLAY THE GAME RITO PLZ

replies.body: No worries, we'd like to help!  Hit us up in a #[support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help out.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to gather a set of logs, and attach it to the ticket for context.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
DONT WORRY I FIGURED IT, JUST WENT INTO SAFE MODE AND DOWNLOADED IT. THANKS FOR TRYING THO RITO.

From 33% and on, your patcher is trying to reach our patching servers but a bad or slow connection is preventing it.  Try our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this for a fix.  Hopefully that will get you squared away, but let me know if you have any questions!
I've done that without success, so what does it mean when the patch gets to 76% and then gives the error message because that was happening aswell.
when I redownload like this time It always happening like dat
